document.full_text: the united states kept russia on monday on its list of countries with the worst records of preventing copyright theft for the 14th straight year and said china was on the list for the seventh year.
document.title: china, russia top u.s. worst pirates list again
lines_and_colors: the united states kept russia on monday on its list of countries with the worst records of preventing copyright theft for the 14th straight year and said china was on the list for the seventh year.
